TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AccessKeyManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 維護所有便捷鍵的註冊，以及 Windows Forms、Win32 與 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 之間 Interop 鍵盤命令的處理。

span.span: Maintains the registration of all access keys and the handling of interop keyboard commands between Windows Forms, Win32, and Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上的每一個要求建立物件。An object is created on demand with one per . 做為事件處理常式會附加，並公開方法，以和存取金鑰。The is attached as an event handler for and exposes methods to and access keys. 按下的已註冊的存取金鑰時，呼叫目標項目上的方法。When the registered access key is pressed, the calls the method on the target element. 項目可以與任意數目的存取金鑰相關聯。An element can be associated with any number of access keys.

MemberSignature.Value: see AddAccessKeyPressedHandler, and RemoveAccessKeyPressedHandler
see AddAccessKeyPressedHandler, and RemoveAccessKeyPressedHandler
see AddAccessKeyPressedHandler, and RemoveAccessKeyPressedHandler
see AddAccessKeyPressedHandler, and RemoveAccessKeyPressedHandler

span.span: Occurs when the access key is pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件用來識別定義範圍的存取金鑰，例如功能表鍵和快顯的索引鍵的項目。This event is used to identify elements that define a scope for access keys, such as menu keys and pop-up keys. 指定的事件由欄位將永遠不會引發; 它用來識別類別，定義新的範圍。The event specified by the field will never be raised; it is used to identify classes that define new scopes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按下便捷鍵時，方法的`element`呼叫。When the access keys is pressed, the method of `element` is called. 項目可以與任意數目的存取金鑰相關聯。An element can be associated with any number of access keys.
